author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
1\. ~~+BANNED~~ (banned 25 days before this post was made)

I was unbanned almost immediately afterwards.

2\. +ShillWall (banned 2020-12-17)

I made 2 comments [here](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5s60/the-difference-between-trolls-and-shills), and I think that was it. They said that I was [brigading](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/5thg/the-wall-of-trolls). (By the way, I downvoted 0 comments there. I did upvote a few though. Also, the guild has not opted out of /all yet, so it's not as if they're hidden to outsiders.)
body_html:
1. +BANNED (banned 25 days before this post was made)

I was unbanned almost immediately afterwards.

2. +ShillWall (banned 2020-12-17)

I made 2 comments here, and I think that was it. They said that I was brigading. (By the way, I downvoted 0 comments there. I did upvote a few though. Also, the guild has not opted out of /all yet, so it's not as if they're hidden to outsiders.)

title: List of guilds I am banned from

author.bio:
vidya.cafe

Ruqqus has lost it's charm, if for some reason you want to contact me, you can find me back at reddit [here](https://www.reddit.com/user/Snoo70306/)

History repeats itself

**101 subscribers**
